Information: The anti-inflammatory property in pennywort is said to treat Arthritis,Cough and other respiratory disorders.Juice of the pennywort leaf with honey may help ease . Decoction of pennywort with holy basil, black pepper also cures cold and fever.
Procedure:
Arthritis:Prepare a decoction by boiling pennywort leaves in water.Drink the decoction regularly to benefit from its anti-inflammatory properties, which may help alleviate symptoms of arthritis and reduce joint pain and inflammation.

Cough and Respiratory Disorders:Extract juice from fresh pennywort leaves.Mix the pennywort leaf juice with honey.Consume the mixture to help soothe cough and alleviate respiratory symptoms such as congestion and inflammation.The anti-inflammatory properties of pennywort leaves may help reduce irritation and promote respiratory health.

Cold and Fever:Prepare a decoction by boiling pennywort leaves with holy basil and black pepper in water.Drink the cooled decoction to help alleviate symptoms of cold and fever.The combination of pennywort with holy basil and black pepper may help boost immunity, reduce fever, and relieve cold symptoms.

Precautions:Use pennywort leaves cautiously and in moderation, as excessive consumption may have adverse effects.Pregnant or breastfeeding women and individuals with underlying health conditions should consult with a healthcare professional before using pennywort leaves medicinally.

Additional Tips:Pennywort leaves can also be incorporated into salads, smoothies, or juices to benefit from their nutritional properties.Always ensure that you use pennywort leaves from a trusted source and discontinue use if you experience any adverse reactions.
